fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: The title of the theatre event

fields.name: city
fields.label: City
fields.description: Add all cities with a comma eg: Nicosia, Limassol, Larnaca, Pafos, Famagusta

fields.name: nicosia_dates
fields.label: Nicosia Dates
fields.description: Input dates on this format YYYY-MM-DD separated by comma. Example:2022-10-08, 2022-10-09

fields.name: limassol_dates
fields.label: Limassol Dates
fields.description: Input dates on this format YYYY-MM-DD separated by comma. Example:2022-10-08, 2022-10-09

fields.name: larnaca_dates
fields.label: Larnaca Dates
fields.description: Input dates on this format YYYY-MM-DD separated by comma. Example:2022-10-08, 2022-10-09

fields.name: famagusta_dates
fields.label: Famagusta Dates
fields.description: Input dates on this format YYYY-MM-DD separated by comma. Example:2022-10-08, 2022-10-09

fields.name: paphos_dates
fields.label: Paphos Dates
fields.description: Input dates on this format YYYY-MM-DD separated by comma. Example:2022-10-08, 2022-10-09

fields.name: event_image
fields.label: Event Image
fields.description: This will be shown in the homepage list

fields.name: cover_image
fields.label: Cover Image
fields.description: This will be shown in the event details as a cover photo

fields.name: category
fields.label: Category
fields.description: I katigoria/katigories tou ergou, comma separated Biography Drama, Comedy, Standup, Children, Historical, Monologue, Musical, Amateur, Tragedy, Novel, Satire, Opera

fields.name: extended
fields.label: Paratasi/Extended
fields.description: Enable this if the event got extended

fields.name: latlong
fields.label: Lat/Long
fields.description: On your computer, open Google Maps. Right-click the place or area on the map. This will open a pop-up window. You can find your latitude and longitude in decimal format at the top
